subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The press office of the mayor has provided an estimated timetable for the dismantling of the old Yankee Stadium, as well as explanations of why it has yet to begin.
snippet: The press office of the mayor has provided an estimated timetable for the dismantling of the old Yankee Stadium, as well as explanations of why it has yet to begin.
